segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene, and it makes me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water cascading down like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see it; she's too absorbed in her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor could make anyone slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stoolâ€”it's tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar, one hand barely holding on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a disaster with the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is right there, waiting eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might get knocked over too in the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the mom turns around soon and stops this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so precarious; my heart is racing just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are drenched already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
